original_text: And the men of Ai smote of them about thirty and six men: for they chased them from before the gate even unto Shebarim, and smote them in the going down: wherefore the hearts of the people melted, and became as water.
korean_text: 아이 사람이 그들을 삼십육 명쯤 쳐죽이고 성문 앞에서부터 스바림까지 쫓아가 내려가는 비탈에서 쳤으므로 백성의 마음이 녹아 물 같이 된지라

sentences.original_text: And the men of Ai smote of them about thirty and six men:
sentences.korean_translation: 아이 사람들이 그들 중 약 삼십육 명을 쳐서 죽였으니

sentences.original_text: for they chased them from before the gate
and smote them in the going down:
wherefore the hearts of the people melted,
